Kraka is a troll guarding Death Plateau.  He has a maximum hit of 240, so it is recommended to use Protect from Melee when fighting him. Like the rest of the "big, bad" trolls in the area, such as Stick, Pee Hat, and Rock, he may drop a Granite shield.

Trolls are named after the first thing they eat, so Kraka probably ate some sort of cracker, possibly a Christmas cracker.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

  • Slayer of Chaos ( 0) – Obtained a collection of unique drops from Slayer monsters located within Keldagrim.
    • Granite shield drop

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 9 August 2004 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Kraka's name is a reference to the word "Cracker", likely referring to Christmas crackers, which are a discontinued item in RuneScape, and contain partyhats. Trolls are named after what they first try to eat, so Kraka must have tried to eat a Christmas cracker, and Pee Hat, his troll counterpart and possible sibling, must have eaten the partyhat when it came out of the Christmas cracker.
